pages.text: The Ritual of Persistence forces the world to remain aware of its surroundings, keeping chunks loaded even when no players are nearby. Essential for automation and remote bases.

pages.title: Costs
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 50,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Upkeep:$() 100 LP per tick (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 3 chunk radius (configurable)$(br2)The ritual maintains chunk loading in a square area around itself. Chunks unload immediately if LP runs out.

pages.title: Usage Notes
pages.text: $(bold)Chunk Radius:$() A radius of 3 means a 7x7 chunk area (49 chunks total).$(br2)$(bold)Persistence:$() Chunks remain loaded even across server restarts as long as the ritual is active.$(br2)$(italic)The world remembers what blood demands.$()
